properties.areaDesc: Ontonagon to Upper Entrance of Portage Canal MI; Black River To Ontonagon MI; Upper Entrance of Portage Canal to Eagle River MI; Eagle River to Manitou Island MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 11:14AM EST until January 7 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and waves
6 to 9 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Black River to Ontonagon MI, Ontonagon to Upper
Entrance of Portage Canal MI, Upper Entrance of Portage Canal
to Eagle River MI and Eagle River to Manitou Island MI.

* WHEN...Until 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
